snippet: It has been a good week for Senator Scott P. Brown, who has managed to keep his challenger, Elizabeth Warren, on the ropes.
abstract: Political Memo; Massachusetts Republican Sen Scott P Brown seizes momentum in his re-election campaign; main challenger Democrat Elizabeth Warren has been engulfed in controversy stemming from accusations by the Brown camp that she sought an unfair advantage in her academic career by claiming American Indian ancestry; analysts are divided about the importance of the ancestry issue and whether it represents a turning point in a race in which the polls have shown the candidates running neck and neck.

byline.original: By ABBY GOODNOUGH and KATHARINE Q. SEELYE

lead_paragraph: It has been a good week for Senator Scott P. Brown, who has managed to keep his challenger, Elizabeth Warren, on the ropes.

headline.seo: Brown and Warren Spar in Senate Race
headline.main: A Shot Is Sunk, and Taken, in Massachusetts Race
headline.print_headline: Shot Sunk, And Taken, In Campaign
